text: Pizza Pizza Limited (PPL), doing business as Pizza Pizza (), is a franchised Canadian pizza fast food restaurant. It has locations throughout Ontario, Canada. Ingredients include pepperoni, pineapples, mushrooms, and other non- exotic produce. Pizza Pizza has served the area for over 30 years. It has over 500 locations around Ontario. It is expanding across the nation. They have recently opened shops in Montreal and British Columbia. == Other websites == * Official website Category:1967 establishments in Canada Category:Canadian fast food restaurants Category:Pizza franchises Category:Companies listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange Category:Companies based in Toronto
title: Pizza Pizza
